text: @BrookeBCNN @BreneBrown Thank you for sharing your COVID19 experience. You were very brave and you help to shed light and understanding of this frightening pandemic.

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: CNN Newsroom
entity.description: "CNN Newsroom" presents the day's headlines and breaking stories live from CNN headquarters in Atlanta. The rotating cast of anchors and contributors includes Carol Costello, Kyra Phillips, Suzanne Malveaux, Brooke Baldwin, Don Lemon, Randi Kaye and Fredricka Whitfield.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
